You go to your average 15-year-old boy, and he will say, "I'll take an Xbox'. I want that average 15-year-old girl[ to be] as excited about the Kinect, and we haven't done as good a job drawing in that broader set of demographics, he said. Simon Cowell is now reportedly doing all he can to convince his American business partners that the 27-year-old Cheryl Cole has what it takes to draw audiences in across the Atlantic. The source added to The Sun newspaper, Simon Cowell has been the only one pushing for her and trying to convince everyone that she'll be a big hit. They want to see if the American public warm to her before she takes on such a high-profile role in one of the biggest shows on U.S. TV. There have been lots of heated conversations and debates about it.

on Thursday, he would earn about$ 334.7 million on the stock sale. He would still own about 2.7 percent of Google's outstanding capital stock, down from 2.9 percent before selling the shares. As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, Eric Schmidt said in a posting on the company's official blog. "And over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured."
